column1: The Edge of the Wild was the counceptual boundary between most of Eriador
column2: which was or had been a settled area
column3: and the dangerous uplands leading to the Misty Mountains and the Wilderland beyond.  Conceptually it was a north-south line that ran just to the west of the Ford of Bruinen.  When one was over (or east) of the Edge of the Wild even the best of plans could easily go astray
